comment: Smart Data Models - GovSteamEU adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/GovSteamEU/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Simplified model  of boiler and steam turbine with PID governor.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: chc
contents.comment: Control valves rate closing limit (Chc).  Unit = PU/sec.  Typical Value = -3.3. Default: 0.0

contents.name: cho
contents.comment: Control valves rate opening limit (Cho).  Unit = PU/sec.  Typical Value = 0.17. Default: 0.0

contents.name: cic
contents.comment: Intercept valves rate closing limit (Cic).  Typical Value = -2.2. Default: 0.0

contents.name: cio
contents.comment: Intercept valves rate opening limit (Cio).  Typical Value = 0.123. Default: 0.0

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: db1
contents.comment: Dead band of the frequency corrector (db1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: db2
contents.comment: Dead band of the speed governor (db2).  Typical Value = 0.0004. Default: 0.0

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: hhpmax
contents.comment: Maximum control valve position (Hhpmax).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ke
contents.comment: Gain of the power controller (Ke).  Typical Value = 0.65. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kfcor
contents.comment: Gain of the frequency corrector (Kfcor).  Typical Value = 20. Default: 0.0

contents.name: khp
contents.comment: Fraction of total turbine output generated by HP part (Khp).  Typical Value = 0.277. Default: 0.0

contents.name: klp
contents.comment: Fraction of total turbine output generated by HP part (Klp).  Typical Value = 0.723. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kwcor
contents.comment: Gain of the speed governor (Kwcor).  Typical Value = 20. Default: 0.0

contents.name: mwbase
contents.comment: Base for power values (MWbase) (>0).  Unit = MW. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: pmax
contents.comment: Maximal active power of the turbine (Pmax).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: prhmax
contents.comment: Maximum low pressure limit (Prhmax).  Typical Value = 1.4. Default: 0.0

contents.name: simx
contents.comment: Intercept valves transfer limit (Simx).  Typical Value = 0.425. Default: 0.0

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: tb
contents.comment: Boiler time constant (Tb).  Typical Value = 100. Default: 0

contents.name: tdp
contents.comment: Derivative time constant of the power controller (Tdp).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: ten
contents.comment: Electro hydraulic transducer (Ten).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0

contents.name: tf
contents.comment: Frequency transducer time constant (Tf).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: tfp
contents.comment: Time constant of the power controller (Tfp).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: thp
contents.comment: High pressure (HP) time constant of the turbine (Thp).  Typical Value = 0.31. Default: 0

contents.name: tip
contents.comment: Integral time constant of the power controller (Tip).  Typical Value = 2. Default: 0

contents.name: tlp
contents.comment: Low pressure(LP) time constant of the turbine (Tlp).  Typical Value = 0.45. Default: 0

contents.name: tp
contents.comment: Power transducer time constant (Tp).  Typical Value = 0.07. Default: 0

contents.name: trh
contents.comment: Reheater  time constant of the turbine (Trh).  Typical Value = 8. Default: 0

contents.name: tvhp
contents.comment: Control valves servo time constant (Tvhp).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0

contents.name: tvip
contents.comment: Intercept valves servo time constant (Tvip).  Typical Value = 0.15. Default: 0

contents.name: tw
contents.comment: Speed transducer time constant (Tw).  Typical Value = 0.02. Default: 0

contents.name: wfmax
contents.comment: Upper limit for frequency correction (Wfmax).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0.0

contents.name: wfmin
contents.comment: Lower limit for frequency correction (Wfmin).  Typical Value = -0.05. Default: 0.0

contents.name: wmax1
contents.comment: Emergency speed control lower limit (wmax1).  Typical Value = 1.025. Default: 0.0

contents.name: wmax2
contents.comment: Emergency speed control upper limit (wmax2).  Typical Value = 1.05. Default: 0.0

contents.name: wwmax
contents.comment: Upper limit for the speed governor (Wwmax).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: wwmin
contents.comment: Lower limit for the speed governor frequency correction (Wwmin).  Typical Value = -1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
